project.name: skyfall
project.component:
<ToolbarAndroid
                    style={styles.toolbar}
                    title="Toolbar"
                    actions={[{
                        title: 'Search',
                        icon: require('../assets/images/baseline_search_white_18dp.png'),
                        show: 'always'
                    }]}
                    navIcon={require("../assets/images/baseline_menu_white_24dp.png")}
                />

<Text style={{margin: 10}}> But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. </Text>

<FlatList
        style={{margin: 10}}
        data={[{key: 'John Snow'}, {key: 'Ronald Snow'}, {key: 'Robert Snow'}]}
        renderItem={this.renderItem.bind(this)}
    />
